 All Data Structures Files Functions Variables Typedefs Enumerations Enumerator Macros Pages
Data Structures
Here are the data structures with brief descriptions:
BANKLOAN_CALL_ADJ_PARAMBankloan information
BANKLOAN_EXTEND_INFO
BOND_STEP_UP_COUPONThis structure is passed to get coupon step up date and trigger
BORROWER_BENEFIT_ELIGIBILITYThis structure describes borrower benefit for a student loan
CCMO_ARM_INFOThis structure holds adjustable rate information about collateral
CCMO_BONDS_SThis structure holds individual bond information
CCMO_COLLAT_ASSUMPTIONSThis structure is passed to the per-collateral assumptions call back function. Populate its element with assumptions for all amortization periods. For use of the per collateral assumptions call back function, populate assumptions for a given collateral for the entire simulation period
CCMO_PERIOD_ASSUMPTIONSThis structure is passed to per-period assumption call back function. Populate the period's element of the arrays with assumptions for the current period. For use of the per period assumptions call back functions, populate the period's element of the arrays to provide assumptions for the current period. All arrays have a size of MAX_PERIODS
CCMO_POOL_INFOThis structure holds information about collateral
CCMO_POOL_INFO_EXThis structure holds information about collateral
CDO_DATE_INFOThis struct stores the date info of the CDOnet Deal
CDO_TEST_FLOWThis struct stores the test projection information
CDO_TEST_INFOThis struct stores CDO test information
CHINA_BOND_INFO
CMM_CUSTOM_ECONOMIC_DATA
CMO_STRUCTThis is the primary structure used to pass information to and from the WSA API
COLLAT_EXTEND_INFOThis structure used for COLLAT_ASSUMP_CB_EX to store extended loan info
COUPON_INFOCoupon information
DEAL_ACCOUNT_INFOThis structure stores information about deal accounts (reserve, insurance, liquidity) in SFW deals
DISTRESSED_PROPERTY_RECOVERYDistressed property recovery information
DPD_ASSUMPTIONAssumption for Default Probability Distribution
DPD_RESULTResult for Default Probability Distribution Simulation
DPD_SCENARIOScenario for Default Probability Distribution Simulation
ESG_CURRENCY_RATE_INPUTSThis structure stores specified inputs to setup ESG specified currency simulation interest rates
ESG_MODEL_INPUTSThis structure stores inputs to setup ESG model interest rates
FFIEC_INPUT_PARAMSThis struct stores FFIEC tests input information
FFIEC_RESULTSThis struct stores results for FFIEC test
FIRST_LOSS_INPUT
FIRST_LOSS_RESULT
GLOBAL_REINVESTMENT_ASSET_INFOThis struct stores asset information for global reinvestment
GLOBAL_REINVESTMENT_INFOThis struct stores information of global reinvestment setting
HECM_INFO
LICENSE_INFOThis structure contains license realted information
LOAN_PRICING_INPUTPrice_loan_ex input information
MARKIT_BOND_CASHFLOWThis structure is used to provide user with bond cashflow. It has projected cashflow as well as possibly one historical cashflow some 0 delay bonds are entitled to. It includes number of cashflow points as well as specific bond cashflow dates. Previously only projected cashflows were available. However some 0 delay floater bond owners might also be entitled to one historical payment. It will be reported in this structure
MARKIT_BOND_CASHFLOW_FOR_MANAGED_CODEThis structure is a variation of structure MARKIT_BOND_CASHFLOW
MARKIT_BOND_INFOThis structure holds individual bond information
MARKIT_COLLAT_CASHFLOWThis structure is used to provide user with collateral cashflow. It includes number of cashflow points as well as collateral cashflow dates
MARKIT_DEAL_INFOThis structure contains deal level information of a deal
MARKIT_DEAL_PAYMENT_GROUPThis structure is the deal level payment group information
MARKIT_DEAL_SURVEILLANCE_DATAThis structure is the deal level surveillance information for a deal
MARKIT_GROUP_INFOThis structure includes multiple coupon and balance information on a collateral group
MARKIT_GROUP_PAYMENT_SETThis structure contains one set of payment group information
MARKIT_GROUP_SURVEILLANCE_DATAThis structure is the collateral group level surveillance information for a deal. This structure is contained in deal level structure MARKIT_DEAL_SURVEILLANCE_DATA
MARKIT_HELOC_LOAN_INFOThis structure contains additional information required by HELOC loans
MARKIT_PAYMENT_BONDThis structure contains the bond be payment of group
MARKIT_PAYMENT_SCHEDULEThis structure contains two arrays in parallel to describe the payment schedule information
MARKIT_POOL_HISTORY_DATAThis structure contains the pool history data
MARKIT_POOL_INFOThis structure holds information about collateral
MARKIT_PREPAY_PENALTYThis structure contains prepayment penalty information
MARKIT_STUDENT_LOAN_INFOThis structure holds information about student loan
MARKIT_SURVEILLANCE_DELINQ_DETAILSThis structure contains prepayment penalty information
MARKIT_SURVEILLANCE_PERFORM_DETAILSThis structure contains loan performance, specifically the prepayment speed and default information
MarkitAdcoDefaultModelDialsThe fine tune parameters for the ADCO default model. This supplements structure MarkitAdcoTuningParam, and is optional
MarkitAdcoPrepayModelDialsThe fine tune parameters for the ADCO prepay model. This supplements structure MarkitAdcoTuningParam, and is optional
MarkitAdcoScenarioParamsThe Scenario parameters users can change from run to run, see ResetADCOScenario()
MarkitAdcoTuningParamThe main tuning parameters for the ADCO default model
MarkitAftDefaultModelDialsThe fine tune parameters for the AFT default model. This supplements structure MarkitAftTuningParam, and is optional
MarkitAftPrepayModelDialsThe fine tune parameters for the AFT prepay model. This supplements structure MarkitAftTuningParam, and is optional
MarkitAftScenarioParamsThe Scenario parameters users can change from run to run, see ResetAFTScenario()
MarkitAftTuningParamThe main tuning parameters for the AFT default model
METRIC_INPUT_STRUCTThis structure stores inputs information for metrics calculation
METRIC_INPUT_STRUCT_EXThis structure stores inputs information for metrics ex calculation
METRIC_RESULTS_STRUCTThis structure stores outputs results for metrics calculation
METRIC_RESULTS_STRUCT_EXThis structure stores metircs results information
MONTE_CARLO_ASSUMPTIONThis struct stores settings of monte carlo assumption
MONTE_CARLO_DEF_PPY_REC_ASSUMPTIONThis struct stores settings of monte carlo economy assumption
MONTE_CARLO_RESULTThis struct stores results of monte carlo run
MOODYS_ACCOUNT_CASHFLOWThis structure is used to provide user with loan cashflow. It includes number of cashflow points as well as loan cashflow dates
MOODYS_BOND_HISTORYThis structure stores historical information of a given bond
MOODYS_BOND_INFOAdditional bond information
MOODYS_DEAL_INFOAdditional deal information
MOODYS_FEE_STRUCTThis structure stores fee information
MOODYS_HEDGE_OVERRIDEThis structure stores hedge override information
MOODYS_HEDGE_STRUCTThis structure stores hedge information
MOODYS_LOAN_CASHFLOWThis structure is used to provide user with loan cashflow. It includes number of cashflow points as well as loan cashflow dates
MOODYS_POOL_HISTORYThis structure stores historical information of a given pool group
MOODYS_POOL_INFO
MOODYS_SSFA_CALCSimplified Supervisory Formula Approach (SSFA) calculation
MOODYS_STUDENT_LOAN_INFOThis structure stores loan level information for a student loan
OAS_PRICE_STRUCTThis structure stores OAS price array
PAY_POOL_INFOThis structure is passed to assumption call back function
PAY_POOL_STATEThis structure is passed to per-period assumption call back function. It contains amortization state of the pool up to current period
PPC_STRUCT
PRICING_RESULTSThis structure used for holding pricing result, including average life, duration, yield etc
RATE_SHIFT_SETTINGThis structure stores inputs to setup ECON rate settings
UK_WHOLE_LOAN_INFO
WHOLE_LOAN_EXTEND_INFO
WHOLE_LOAN_SINK_FUND
WHOLE_LOAN_STRUCTWhole loan information
  • Generated on Wed May 22 2019 21:18:35 for WSA API REFERENCE GUIDE by Moody's Analytics SAV
